Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute at Ashland/Fulton
ShortDescription: Southbound 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Grand, Ogden, Carroll and Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/Fulton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Grand, Ogden, Carroll and Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/Fulton.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running with delays at Sedgwick due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running with delays at Sedgwick due to police activity.

Shuttle buses are available from Fullerton to Clark/Lake to provide additional connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
